alert.note: Alert for Culebra; Eastern Interior; Mayaguez and Vicinity; North Central; Northwest; San Juan and Vicinity (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 22 at 10:59AM ADT until July 22 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values of 112 degrees Fahrenheit or higher. * WHERE...Urban and coastal areas of western and northern Puerto Rico, mainly from Mayaguez in the west northward to Aguadilla in the northwest and eastward to Carolina in the north. Also, lower elevations and urban areas of the eastern interior of Puerto Rico, around Caguas, Gurabo, San Lorenzo, Juncos, and Las Piedras. * WHEN...Through 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion or heat stroke likely with prolonged exposure.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency, call 9 1 1. An Excessive Heat Warning means that a prolonged period of dangerously hot temperatures will occur. The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a DANGEROUS SITUATION in which heat illnesses are likely. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Culebra; Eastern Interior; Mayaguez and Vicinity; North Central; Northwest; San Juan and Vicinity
